bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: the whale boat
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original.

div1.head: the whale boat, —"the harpooneersman"

p.hi: the blubber, the clear oil in the head, the whale boat

div1.p: an old whale is probably a thousand years old
the cow has but one calf at a birth
She will sometimes when alarmed, enclose it, with as with her fins, and idve down into the deep sea—(just like a mother with protects her child.)
(feeding on squid—large chunks a foot square or larger are sometimes found in the belly of a whale—it is I believe like the white meat of the halibut drum, Ve
